scripts.watch:parallel: parallelshell 'yarn run browsersync' 'yarn run watch:sass' 'yarn run watch:js'
scripts.watch:sass: watch --interval 0.1 'yarn run sass && yarn run postcss' assets/_sass
scripts.watch:js: watch --interval 0.1 'yarn run eslint && yarn run concat' assets/_js
scripts.dist: yarn run mkdirp && parallelshell 'yarn run dist:css' 'yarn run dist:js' 'yarn run imagemin'
scripts.dist:css: yarn run sass && yarn run dist:postcss
scripts.dist:js: yarn run eslint && yarn run concat && yarn run uglify && rm assets/js/*.map
